chapter.title: Using your own images and icons

section.title: Using LJ/Img.pm
section.para: &lj; uses a standard set of icons for specific pages that are distributed through the htdocs/img directory. The cgi-bin/LJ/Img.pm file handles the configuration for these images. Each image is configured as an associative array in perl, setup with attributes for each file. Text for alt attributes can be English-stripped, so the text is pulled from the language file.
cgi-bin/LJ/Img.pm is provided. Don't change that. But go ahead and add a new file, cgi-bin/LJ/ImgLocal.pm beside it in the same format, which LJ/Img.pm will find and use.
